title: 'Good product for the price but received wrong colour'

title: 'Misleading Colour'
body: 'Worth a buy but the colour shown is completely misleading.'

title: 'Both durable and long-lasting'
body: 'These water bottles are made from high-quality materials that are both durable and long-lasting. Even after several uses
column5: the bottles have held up perfectly without showing any signs of wear and tear.  One of the best things about these bottles is that they are completely odor-free. The bottles are also very solid and well-constructed
column6: which gives me confidence that they will last for many years to come.  Overall
column7: I am extremely happy with the Milton Pacific 1000 Pet Water Bottles and would highly recommend them to others. I appreciate the attention to detail that went into making these bottles and will definitely be purchasing more in the future. Five stars all around!'
